name: MissSabrina_Bot
description: A powerful Telegram group manager bot by TechnoAyanOfficial

OWNER_ID.description: Numeric Telegram user ID of the bot owner

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: Chat ID where replied messages are stored (optional)

SUDO_USERS.description: Space-separated list of user IDs who are sudo users

SUPPORT_USERS.description: Space-separated list of support user IDs (gban/ungban access)

WHITELIST_USERS.description: Space-separated user IDs who cannot be banned

DONATION_LINK.description: Link to your donation or support page

STRICT_GBAN.description: Apply GBANs across all current and future groups

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Allow commands to be triggered with '!' in addition to '/'

BAN_STICKER.description: Sticker file_id to send when banning users
